abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network

progress.wait_for_confirm_pairing: To complete setup, press power button on the device once to confirm pairing.
progress.wait_for_pairing_mode:
To complete setup, put this device in pairing mode.

### How to enter pairing mode
1. Close Boneco mobile apps.
2. Press and hold the power button on the device for at least 7 seconds. Release when the LED starts to flash blue.

bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

confirm_pairing_timeout.description: The device did not confirm pairing. Select Submit to try pairing again.

pairing_timeout.description:
The device did not enter pairing mode. Select Submit to try again.

### Troubleshooting
1. Check that the device isn't connected to the mobile app.
2. Unplug the device for 5 seconds, then plug it back in.

user.description: Choose a device to set up
